flavor: You imbue the weapon with the void energy of death.

magic.label: Death (Magic)
magic.level-4-spells: The weapon can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} once per day.
magic.level-6-spells: The weapon can cast either 2nd rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XFtO4BBI22Uox2QP]{Sudden Blight} once per day, but not both.
magic.level-8-spells: The weapon can cast 3rd rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} and 3rd rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XFtO4BBI22Uox2QP]{Sudden Blight} once per day each.
magic.level-12-spells: The weapon can cast 4th rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm}, 4th rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XFtO4BBI22Uox2QP]{Sudden Blight} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.07xYlmGX32XtHGEt]{Vampiric Maiden} once per day each.
magic.level-16-spells: The weapon can cast 6th rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm}, 6th rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.07xYlmGX32XtHGEt]{Vampiric Maiden} and raise the reaper's scythe (source: Battlezoo Bestiary Elemental Storm) (original negative imbuement used @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.6lO6uMQxbqmYho0e]{Necrotize}) once per day each.
magic.level-20-wails-of-the-damned: The weapon can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.FEsuyf203wTNE2et]{Wails of the Damned} once per day.

might.label: Death (Might)
might.level-10-enfeebled: On a critical hit, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} for 1 round.
might.level-12-resistance: The void damage dealt by this imbued property ignores resistances.
might.level-16-enfeebled: On a critical hit, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} for 1 round.
might.level-20-weakness: On a successful Strike with the weapon, before applying void damage, the target gains weakness 1 to void until the beginning of your next turn.

tech.label: Death (Technique)
tech.level-8-enfeebled: On a critical hit, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} for 1 round.
tech.level-12-resistance: The void damage dealt by this imbued property (including persistent void damage) ignores resistances.
tech.level-16-enfeebled: On a critical hit, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} for 1 round.
tech.level-20-weakness: While the foe has persistent void damage from the imbued property, the enfeebled condition from a critical hit lasts until the persistent damage ends or for 1 round, whichever is longer.
